snippet: Afghanistan’s president has shown his truly sinister side in demonizing the United States.
abstract: Editorial holds Afghanistan Pres Hamid Karzai has shown his truly sinister side by accusing United States of colluding with Taliban on suicide attacks; contends Karzai's behavior only weakens arguments for keeping forces in Afghanistan for extended period of time.
